languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт тихонько смеется.{/n} "Пожалуй. Все потому, что я осознала нечто действительно важное — души моих предков с Алайтока случайно разбили мой камень. Они не желали зла — лишь оберегали дитя, что пережило множество тягот на пути Изгоя. И они... действительно помогли мне, {name}. Я снова могу погружаться в свой мир и медитировать!"

{n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт тихонько смеется.{/n} "Пожалуй. Все потому, что я осознала нечто действительно важное — души моих предков с Алайтока случайно разбили мой камень. Они не желали зла — лишь оберегали дитя, что пережило множество тягот на пути Изгоя. И они... действительно помогли мне, {name}. Я снова могу погружаться в свой мир и медитировать!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. All because I had realised something really important — it were the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They didn't mean harm — they were just trying to protect the child walking down the path of the Outcast. And they... have really helped me, {name}. I can meditate and dive into my world again!"

{n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. All because I had realised something really important — it were the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They didn't mean harm — they were just trying to protect the child walking down the path of the Outcast. And they... have really helped me, {name}. I can meditate and dive into my world again!"

They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

{n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

{n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特柔声笑了起来。{/n}“或许吧。这一切都是因为我意识到了某件非常重要的事——阿莱托克先祖无意间打碎了我的灵魂石，但他们不是想要伤害我，而是想要保护这个踏上了流浪者道途的孩子。他们……他们真的帮了大忙，{name}。我现在又可以冥想了，又可以完全沉浸在我自己的世界中了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特柔声笑了起来。{/n}“或许吧。这一切都是因为我意识到了某件非常重要的事——阿莱托克先祖无意间打碎了我的灵魂石，但他们不是想要伤害我，而是想要保护这个踏上了流浪者道途的孩子。他们……他们真的帮了大忙，{name}。我现在又可以冥想了，又可以完全沉浸在我自己的世界中了！”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet ríe quedamente.{/n} «Es probable. La cuestión es que he comprendido algo muy importante: fueron las almas de mis ancestros de Alaitoc las que hicieron añicos accidentalmente mi joya espiritual. No pretendían lastimarme, tan solo protegían a una niña que recorría la Senda del Proscrito. Y ellos... ya lo creo que me han ayudado, {name}. ¡Ahora puedo volver a meditar y sumergirme en mi mundo interior!».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet ríe quedamente.{/n} «Es probable. La cuestión es que he comprendido algo muy importante: fueron las almas de mis ancestros de Alaitoc las que hicieron añicos accidentalmente mi joya espiritual. No pretendían lastimarme, tan solo protegían a una niña que recorría la Senda del Proscrito. Y ellos... ya lo creo que me han ayudado, {name}. ¡Ahora puedo volver a meditar y sumergirme en mi mundo interior!».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se met à rire doucement.{/n} « Peut-être. C'est parce que j'ai réalisé quelque chose de très important : ce sont les âmes de mes ancêtres d'Alaitoc qui ont brisé ma pierre-esprit par accident. Ils ne cherchaient pas à me nuire, ils voulaient simplement protéger une enfant qui arpentait la Voie de l'Errance. Et ils... m'ont vraiment aidée, {name}. Je peux à nouveau méditer et me plonger dans mon monde ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se met à rire doucement.{/n} « Peut-être. C'est parce que j'ai réalisé quelque chose de très important : ce sont les âmes de mes ancêtres d'Alaitoc qui ont brisé ma pierre-esprit par accident. Ils ne cherchaient pas à me nuire, ils voulaient simplement protéger une enfant qui arpentait la Voie de l'Errance. Et ils... m'ont vraiment aidée, {name}. Je peux à nouveau méditer et me plonger dans mon monde ! »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lacht leise.{/n} "Könnte sein. Das liegt daran, dass mir etwas sehr Wichtiges klar geworden ist – es waren die Seelen meiner Alaitoc-Ahnen, die versehentlich meinen Seelenstein zerstörten. Sie wollten mir nichts Böses – sie haben nur versucht, ein Kind auf dem Pfad des Ausgestoßenen zu beschützen. Und sie ... haben mir tatsächlich geholfen, {name}. Ich kann wieder meditieren und in meine Welt eintauchen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lacht leise.{/n} "Könnte sein. Das liegt daran, dass mir etwas sehr Wichtiges klar geworden ist – es waren die Seelen meiner Alaitoc-Ahnen, die versehentlich meinen Seelenstein zerstörten. Sie wollten mir nichts Böses – sie haben nur versucht, ein Kind auf dem Pfad des Ausgestoßenen zu beschützen. Und sie ... haben mir tatsächlich geholfen, {name}. Ich kann wieder meditieren und in meine Welt eintauchen!"

languages.text: {n}ユリエットが優しく笑う。{/n}「おそらく。我の魂縛石を誤って砕いたのは、アレイトックの父祖の魂だった。彼らは我に危害を加えるつもりはなかった。ただ、追放者の道を歩む子供を守ろうとしただけだった。そして彼らは…本当に我を助けてくれたのだ、{name}。我は瞑想し、再び自分の世界に没入することができるようになった！」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットが優しく笑う。{/n}「おそらく。我の魂縛石を誤って砕いたのは、アレイトックの父祖の魂だった。彼らは我に危害を加えるつもりはなかった。ただ、追放者の道を歩む子供を守ろうとしただけだった。そして彼らは…本当に我を助けてくれたのだ、{name}。我は瞑想し、再び自分の世界に没入することができるようになった！」

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, . I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hafifçe gülüyor.{/n} "Olabilir. Tüm bunların sebebi, çok önemli bir şeyi fark etmiş olmam. Ruh taşımı kazara parçalayanlar, Alaitoc atalarımın ruhlarıydı. Bana zarar verme niyetinde değillerdi, sadece Yurtsuzun Yolu'nda yürüyen bir çocuğa yardım etmek istiyorlardı. Sahiden de yardımları dokundu ama {name}. Yeniden meditasyon yapıp dünyamın derinliklerine dalabiliyorum artık!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet laughs softly.{/n} "Probably. This is all because I have realised something really important — it was the souls of my Alaitoc ancestors that accidentally shattered my spirit stone. They meant me no harm — they were just trying to protect a child who walked the Path of the Outcast. And they... truly did help me, {name}. I can meditate and immerse myself in my world again!"

Bana zarar verme niyetinde değillerdi, sadece Yurtsuzun Yolu'nda yürüyen bir çocuğa yardım etmek istiyorlardı. Sahiden de yardımları dokundu ama {name}. Yeniden meditasyon yapıp dünyamın derinliklerine dalabiliyorum artık!"
